org.msgpack.rpc.client
Class UDPClient

java.lang.Object
  org.msgpack.rpc.client.Session
      org.msgpack.rpc.client.Client
          org.msgpack.rpc.client.UDPClient

public class UDPClient
extends Client

The UDPClient class for MessagePack-RPC. If you use this class, the UDP transport is used to send/receive the data. Please lookat Client class for the example codes.

See Also:
Client
